verses.verse: 'Now when <S%H3588><s%> anyone <S%H5315><s%> presents <S%H7126><s%> a grain offering <S%H4503><s%> as an offering <S%H7133><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> shall be of fine <S%H5560><s%> flour, <S%H5560><s%> and he shall pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on it and put <S%H5414><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%> on it.

'He shall then bring <S%H935><s%> it to Aaron's sons, <S%H1121><s%> the priests; <S%H3548><s%> and shall take <S%H7061><s%> from it his handful <S%H4393><s%> <S%H7062><s%> of its fine <S%H5560><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> and of its oil <S%H8081><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> of its frankincense. <S%H3828><s%> And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H6999><s%> [it] up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> [as] its memorial <S%H234><s%> portion <S%H234><s%> on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> of a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

'And the remainder <S%H3498><s%> of the grain offering <S%H4503><s%> belongs to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons: <S%H1121><s%> a thing <S%H6944><s%> most <S%H6944><s%> holy, <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> by fire. <S%H801><s%>

'Now when you bring <S%H7126><s%> an offering <S%H7133><s%> of a grain offering <S%H4503><s%> baked <S%H3989><s%> in an oven, <S%H8574><s%> [it shall be] unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> of fine <S%H5560><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> or unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> spread <S%H4886><s%> with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

'And if <S%H518><s%> your offering <S%H7133><s%> is a grain offering <S%H4503><s%> [made] on the griddle, <S%H4227><s%> [it shall be] of fine <S%H5560><s%> flour, <S%H5560><s%> unleavened, <S%H4682><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil; <S%H8081><s%>
you shall break <S%H6626><s%> it into bits, <S%H6595><s%> and pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on it; it is a grain offering. <S%H4503><s%>

'Now if <S%H518><s%> your offering <S%H7133><s%> is a grain offering <S%H4503><s%> [made <S%H6213><s%>] in a pan, <S%H4802><s%> it shall be made of fine <S%H5560><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

'When you bring <S%H935><s%> in the grain offering <S%H4503><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is made <S%H6213><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> it shall be presented <S%H7126><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> and he shall bring <S%H5066><s%> it to the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

'The priest <S%H3548><s%> then shall take <S%H7311><s%> up from the grain offering <S%H4503><s%> its memorial <S%H234><s%> portion, <S%H234><s%> and shall offer <S%H6999><s%> [it] up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> [as] an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> of a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

'And the remainder <S%H3498><s%> of the grain offering <S%H4503><s%> belongs to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons: <S%H1121><s%> a thing <S%H6944><s%> most <S%H6944><s%> holy, <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> by fire. <S%H801><s%>

'No <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you bring <S%H7126><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> shall be made <S%H6213><s%> with leaven, <S%H2557><s%> for you shall not offer <S%H6999><s%> up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> leaven <S%H7603><s%> or any <S%H3605><s%> honey <S%H1706><s%> as an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

'As an offering <S%H7133><s%> of first <S%H7225><s%> fruits, <S%H7225><s%> you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> them to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> but they shall not ascend <S%H5927><s%> for a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

'Every <S%H3605><s%> grain offering <S%H7133><s%> <S%H4503><s%> of yours, moreover, you shall season <S%H4414><s%> with salt, <S%H4417><s%> so that the salt <S%H4417><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of your God <S%H430><s%> shall not be lacking <S%H7673><s%> from your grain offering; <S%H4503><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your offerings <S%H7133><s%> you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> salt. <S%H4417><s%>

'Also if <S%H518><s%> you bring <S%H7126><s%> a grain offering <S%H4503><s%> of early <S%H1061><s%> ripened <S%H1061><s%> things <S%H1061><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> fresh <S%H24><s%> heads <S%H24><s%> of grain <S%H24><s%> roasted <S%H7033><s%> in the fire, <S%H784><s%> grits <S%H1643><s%> of new <S%H3759><s%> growth, <S%H3759><s%> for the grain offering <S%H4503><s%> of your early <S%H1061><s%> ripened <S%H1061><s%> things. <S%H1061><s%>
'You shall then put <S%H5414><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on it and lay <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H3828><s%> on it; it is a grain offering. <S%H4503><s%>

'And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H6999><s%> up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> its memorial <S%H234><s%> portion, <S%H234><s%> part of its grits <S%H1643><s%> and its oil <S%H8081><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> its incense <S%H3828><s%> as an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
